name: Rich Clicks
description:
Rich Clicks is an Award Winning Digital Marketing Consultancy Agency specialised in Performance Marketing and E-Commerce. We offer SEO, Search Advertising, Social Media, Automation Marketing and E-commerce services for companies in the UK, Italy, Spain and France. We are a proud RAR Recommended Agency and among the top 10 agencies for 16 categories in the Digital Marketing Industry.
We are a RAR Digital Award Winner for 2 consecutive years (2015, 2016) in Digital Strategies and Effectiveness.Â
